bookmarkBarHelpContent.message: This area shows the items in your bookmark toolbar, folders are hidden.

bookmarkBrowserHelp.message:
This box lets you quickly navigate your bookmarks. You can drag the important ones to the box on the right.

If you want to display a different folder on the right, navigate to that folder and click 'Show as main'.

bookmarkControlsHelpMsg.message: You can now customize the folder shown on the right panel - navigate to that folder and click 'Show as main'.

chromeBuggedText.message: Chrome Bookmarks are not ready yet. Please close this tab and open the startpage in a new tab.

chromeSyncBug.message: This Chrome version does not support bookmark sync.

confirm_uninstall.message: Are you sure you wish to uninstall '$title$' ?

defaultNotepadText.message:
Thank you for installing
Incredible StartPage!
 
This is your own notepad. You can take note here!

description.message: A new, customizable start page for Chrome. Easily find your favorite bookmarks and closed tabs. Take notes as you browse.

existingBmLabel.message: Check this to overwrite current notepad content

fileWarning.message: The image is too large! Please choose another one!

googleAppsAccountDescription.message: Enter only your Google Apps domain without "www", e.g. visibotech.com

incredibleStartPageDescription.message:
Incredible StartPage replaces your default starting page with a customizable view of your bookmarks, reminders and recent tabs.
Click here for a simple tutorial.

name.message: Incredible StartPage - Productive Start Page for Chrome!

noteUpdatedAtOtherPlacesText.message: The note has been updated from other places, please reload this page.

notepadSyncDescription.message: Sync notepad contents with your Google Account

notepadSyncDescription2.message: Chrome Bookmark Sync must be enabled, click [here] for more information

optionsEffect.message: Changes will be applied after reloading your startpage.

useLocalLabel.message: Local File (~1024px wide, jpg format & max. size 500K):

wallpaperThemeCustomTips.message: Or use a gradient as the background:
